hero.title: The VPN That Always Connects
hero.subtitle: macOS AppStore Hong Kong Tools Top 3
hero.subtitleIosMobile: iOS AppStore Hong Kong Tools Top 5

features.title: One-Tap "Quick Connect", Smooth as Silk
features.description: LetsVPN uses a new core and AI smart connection to automatically match you with the fastest global network node. Just tap "Start Quick Connect" and enjoy a silk-smooth surfing experience within 3 seconds.

features.title: Reach Anywhere, No Limits
features.description: LetsVPN supports global network resources, providing unrestricted and unlogged access to any resource, while using advanced technology to erase any traces, truly enabling you to reach anywhere.

features.title: Industry Leader, Safe and Secure
features.description: LetsVPN is a long-term leader in the AppStore tools category, has passed Google's independent security audit, and is certified by App Esteem for international network security. While providing network freedom, it stores no personal information, strictly protecting your privacy.

features.title: Use as You Go, Never Locked In
features.description: The only well-known VPN in the world daring to offer short-term memberships. Prioritizing user rights alongside security and stability, subscribe whenever you need, and never worry about service discontinuation or being locked into long contracts.

features.title: Unlimited Platforms, Seamless Connection
features.description: LetsVPN supports all mainstream devices on the market. One account allows sharing membership across multiple devices, supporting simultaneous online access for seamless transitions between different usage scenarios.

features.title: Live Customer Support, Always Connected
features.description: LetsVPN offers 24/7 online service, with 100+ live customer support operators and network engineers on standby to ensure your internet experience, truly providing on-call, always-connected VIP service.

reviews.name: MangoFlavorFairy
reviews.title: Individual User
reviews.text: LetsVPN is a great app! The interface is simple and user-friendly. Connection is stable for videos and games. Love using it for Instagram!

reviews.name: Ms. Wang
reviews.title: Designer, Shanghai
reviews.text: After using LetsVPN, my internet speed has significantly improved. No more video buffering! Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Mr. Li
reviews.title: Project Manager, Beijing
reviews.text: The interface is clean and easy to use, and one-click connection is very convenient. Lots of global nodes and professional customer service.

reviews.name: Xiao Zhang
reviews.title: Student, Guangzhou
reviews.text: Security and stability are excellent, and the price is reasonable. Very friendly for students like us.

reviews.name: Anonymous User
reviews.title: Gaming Enthusiast
reviews.text: Latency for playing on international servers is much lower, thumbs up! Hope for more promotions.

reviews.name: User Six
reviews.title: Tester
reviews.text: This is the sixth review to test desktop display.

hero.title: Earn <1>Cash</1> for Referrals
hero.description: Refer one person to install and earn up to 5 Yuan. Get an additional weekly bonus of 100 Yuan. Withdraw to Alipay or bank card. No personal info like ID needed for registration. Easy guide!
hero.scanPrompt: Scan to become a promoter now

infoCards.title: Earn 5 Yuan per Referral
infoCards.description: Everyone has a unique referral ID. When a new user enters your ID during their first installation, it's a successful referral. The process is extremely simple.

infoCards.title: Extra 100 Yuan Weekly Bonus
infoCards.description: When your weekly referrals reach 100, you'll earn an extra 100 Yuan bonus on top of basic referral rewards.

infoCards.title: Weekly Payouts, Simple Withdrawal
infoCards.description: No need to provide personal info like IDs. All earnings can be withdrawn to Alipay or bank cards.
